==Description==
[[Meditation]] is a skill used to recover [[Mana]] more quickly. [[Meditation]] works passively to regain [[Mana]] but can also be used to invoke the skill directly, increasing [[Mana]] regeneration even more. Meditation is often used in conjunction with the [[Magery]] skill but [[Mana]] is required for [[Inscription]] when making scrolls as well. It is typical for a player to have [[Meditation]] with a [[Magery]] template. 

Using the [[Meditation]] skill is useful when a character has reached low [[Mana]] and can be used during breaks in Player vs Player scenarios as well as pauses in combat with creatures. Any actions performed when [[Meditation|Meditating]] will cancel it's invoked regeneration.

A character receives neither passive nor active [[Meditation]] bonuses while wearing non-medable armor. Warriors who wear plate or chain typically do not regenerate [[Mana]] quickly enough to cast Magery Spells effectively. Mages who want to conserve and regenerate [[Mana]] typically wear Leather Armor.
